victim.name: Endangered Penguin
victim.death_details: Penguin was killed in what Inspector Irratino called penguicide
victim.case_context: Found Inspector Irratino weeping over the killed endangered penguin

suspects.name: Chancellor Tuscany
suspects.description: As the head of Deduction College, she is respected for her power, her knowledge, and the fact that she's never been caught
suspects.motive: Academic power and hidden criminal history

suspects.name: The Duchess of Vermillion
suspects.description: A tall, old woman with tall, old secrets. How many times am I going to tell you this?
suspects.motive: Mysterious old secrets and aristocratic privilege

suspects.name: Mx. Tangerine
suspects.description: Proving that non-binary people can be murderers, too: they are a scientist, skier, and suspect
suspects.motive: Scientific research or athletic competition related

weapons.name: Poisoned Hot Chocolate
weapons.description: Drink up, and it's the last warm tummy you'll ever have

weapons.name: An Ice Axe
weapons.description: For climbing and killing anything else where you need to make a small hole

weapons.name: An Icicle Dagger
weapons.description: The perfect weapon. You stab someone and only leave a puddle behind

locations.name: The Ping-Pong Room
locations.description: For letting off steam, or (perhaps more aptly) for breaking the ice. There are snacks!

locations.name: The Frozen Wastelands
locations.description: A vast, unforgiving wilderness, but at least you can get some alone time
locations.significance: Isolated outdoor area, natural ice available

locations.name: The Barracks
locations.description: Where everybody sleeps under incredibly cozy blankets

clues.description: The suspect in the frozen wastelands had white hair
points_to: The Duchess of Vermillion was in frozen wastelands

clues.description: The scientist/skier/suspect did not bring an icicle dagger
eliminates: Mx. Tangerine did not bring icicle dagger
clues.analysis: Mx. Tangerine is described as scientist/skier/suspect

statements.speaker: Chancellor Tuscany
statements.statement: As the holder of seven PhDs, let me just say: I was in the ping-pong room

statements.speaker: The Duchess of Vermillion
statements.statement: Do you want to know what I think? Chancellor Tuscany brought poisoned hot chocolate
statements.analysis: This is the lie - Duchess is the murderer

statements.speaker: Mx. Tangerine
statements.statement: If I had to say something, an ice axe was in the barracks
statements.analysis: Establishes ice axe location with Tangerine

solution.motive: Unknown secrets and aristocratic privilege allowing criminal behavior
logic_chain: Duchess has white hair so was in frozen wastelands
Mx. Tangerine (scientist/skier) didn't bring icicle dagger
Tuscany was in ping-pong room (true statement)
Ice axe was in barracks (true statement)
Tangerine must be in barracks with ice axe
Duchess's statement about Tuscany bringing hot chocolate is the lie
Weapon assignments: Tangerine has ice axe, Tuscany has icicle dagger, Duchess has hot chocolate
Duchess used poisoned hot chocolate in frozen wastelands
